recipe.title: Carrot Orange Ginger Juice Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 3 ; navel oranges, peeled and cut into segments

steps.step: Add the orange, carrot, and ginger to a blender, and blend until smooth.
Using a mesh strainer, strain the juice over a large liquid measuring cup to remove the pulp. Use a spoon to help stir the pulp and press out the liquid. Reserve the pulp to make pulp muffins.
Chill the juice for at least 30 minutes (and keep up to 3 days).

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add the orange, carrot, and ginger to a blender, and blend until smooth.
Using a mesh strainer, strain the juice over a large liquid measuring cup to remove the pulp.
Use a spoon to help stir the pulp and press out the liquid.
Reserve the pulp to make pulp muffins.
Chill the juice for at least 30 minutes (and keep up to 3 days).
